title: Ecbboss
author: Ecbboss
content: The project: EURO Stable coin.We Are looking For investors,developers,business owners,marketing people,influencers,bounty managers,growd funding managers,other who have some value to bring in this.Total ammount Will be 3x times of total debt of euro zone.The first ammount will be given as granted loan with guarantees. ( Most realistic idea-Ukraine need support so first few Hundred milions of euros we Will give to ukraine)The blockchain we use: Your suggestions Are Welcome we also we should create our own wallet app so every user who want to use our currency Will download the app and use it.We need serious Partners and If you have nothing constructive to say about our project then better dont becouse let's keep this topic clean as possible.For biggest helpers we will have biggest airdrops and rewards this one gona be one of the biggest business opportunity once life time you definately want to be involved in this.The project admins are with with full financial background banking and economics so we will get this going on.So are in this let me know let's get it done asap.

comments.author: Bill Gates
comments.body: Quote from: Ecbboss on November 17, 2022, 11:41:12 AMFor biggest helpers we will have biggest airdrops and rewards this one gona be one of the biggest business opportunity once life time you definately want to be involved in this.Ok kid. This is Bitcointalk. Try harder. Better luck next time.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Ecbboss on November 17, 2022, 11:41:12 AMIf you have nothing constructive to say about our project then better dont becouse let's keep this topic clean as possible.You should be open to criticisms, constructive or not. Because you have yourself in with this type of project, you should be more open to it because they'll come eventually, and let's say it becomes a successful project, there will be more of them for sure.It's not all about keeping the topic clean but it's better to see it mess up you're trying to maintain it professionally and answer most of those queries in a professional manner. That's why you should be prepared for it.

comments.author: mcabrito
comments.body: I'm open minded.. Count me in.. PM me. Thanks.
